register.reg_long_name: System Performance Monitors Device Affinity Register

purpose_text.para: For additional information, see the CoreSight Architecture Specification.
For a System PMU that has affinity with a single PE or a group of PEs, SPMDEVAFF_EL1 is a copy of MPIDR_EL1 or part of MPIDR_EL1:

listitem.content: If the System PMU has affinity with a single PE, then the affinity level is 0 and SPMDEVAFF_EL1 reads the same value as MPIDR_EL1, and SPMDEVAFF_EL1.F0V reads-as-one to indicate affinity level 0.

If the System PMU has affinity with a group of PEs, then the affinity level is 1, 2, or 3, parts of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 reads the same value as parts of MPIDR_EL1, and the rest of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 indicates the level.

purpose_text.para: For example, if the group of PEs is a subset of the PEs at affinity level 1 then all of the following are true:

listitem.content: All the PEs in the group have the same values in MPIDR_EL1.{Aff3,Aff2}, and these values are equal to SPMDEVAFF_EL1.{Aff3,Aff2}.

SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1 is nonzero and not 0x80, and SPMDEVAFF_EL1.{Aff0,F0V} read-as-zero, to indicate at least affinity level 1. The subset of PEs at level 1 that the System PMU has affinity with is indicated by the least-significant set bit in SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1. In this example, if SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[2:0] is 0b100, then the System PMU has affinity with the up-to 8 PEs that have MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:3] == SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:3].

purpose_text.para: Depending on the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED nature of the system, it might be possible that SPMDEVAFF_EL1 is read before system firmware has configured the System PMU and/or the PE or group of PEs that the System PMU has affinity with. When this is the case, SPMDEVAFF_EL1 reads as zero.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
PE affinity level 3. The MPIDR_EL1.Aff3 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE or PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.
Indicates that the SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0 field is valid.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0 is not valid, and the PE affinity is above level 0 or a subset of level 0.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0 is valid, and the PE affinity is at level 0.

field_description.para: Uniprocessor. The MPIDR_EL1.U field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.
Reserved, UNKNOWN.
Reserved, RES0.
Multithreaded. The MPIDR_EL1.MT field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.
Reserved, UNKNOWN.
PE affinity level 2. The MPIDR_EL1.Aff2 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE or PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a PE or PEs at affinity level 2 or below

field_description.para: PE affinity level 2. Defines part of the MPIDR_EL1.Aff2 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:1] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:1], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:2] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:2], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:3] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:3], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:4] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:4], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:5] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:5], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7:6] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7:6], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff2[7] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff2[7], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a sub-set of PEs at affinity level 2

field_description.para: PE affinity level NOT DEFINED. Indicates whether the PE affinity is at level 3.
All other values are reserved.

field_value_description.para: PE affinity is at level 3.

field_description.para: PE affinity level 1. The MPIDR_EL1.Aff1 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE or PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a PE or PEs at affinity level 1 or below

field_description.para: PE affinity level 1. Defines part of the MPIDR_EL1.Aff1 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:1] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:1], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:2] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:2], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:3] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:3], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:4] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:4], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:5] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:5], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7:6] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7:6], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff1[7] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff1[7], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a sub-set of PEs at affinity level 1

field_description.para: PE affinity level 1. Indicates whether the PE affinity is at level 2.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: PE affinity is above level 2 or a subset of level 2.
PE affinity is at level 2.

field_description.para: PE affinity level 0. The MPIDR_EL1.Aff0 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PE.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a PE at affinity level 0

field_description.para: PE affinity level 0. Defines part of the MPIDR_EL1.Aff0 field, viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:1] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:1], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:2] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:2], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:3] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:3], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:4] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:4], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:5] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:5], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7:6] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7:6], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1.Aff0[7] is the value of MPIDR_EL1.Aff0[7], viewed from the highest Exception level of the associated PEs.

field.fields_condition: When affine with a sub-set of PEs at affinity level 0

field_description.para: PE affinity level 0. Indicates whether the PE affinity is at level 1.
This field has an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED value.

field_value_description.para: PE affinity is above level 1 or a subset of level 1.
PE affinity is at level 1.

access_permission_text.para: Reads of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 are not affected by the value of VMPIDR_EL2 at any Exception level.
If System PMU <s> has affinity only with this PE, then it is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether SPMDEVAFF_EL1 reads-as-zero or reads the same value as MPIDR_EL1.
To access SPMDEVAFF_EL1 for System PMU <s>, set SPMSELR_EL0.SYSPMUSEL to s.
SPMDEVAFF_EL1 reads-as-zero if any of the following are true:

listitem.content: System PMU <s> has no affinity with the PE or cluster of PEs.

ps.name: MRS
